entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Light snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
